name: CLEAN-UP JANITOR
description:
"CLEAN-UP JANITOR" is a fan-made sequel to the 1985 arcade classic "City Connection" by Jaleco. 

Run through 9 unique levels while you clean the floor! Keep in mind there will be pesky bugs that will dirty everything you clean. You don't like them? SQUISH THEM WITH YOUR BROOM! Oh, but don't forget to pick it back up, later...

Do you truly have what it takes to set a new high score?

----------

Press F4 to set fullscreen

As part of the Week Sauce Game Jam, this game was developed entirely by PeterPlaty within the 7 days limit. 

Special thanks to Rila, Enry and all of the playtesters!
